item.description:
Happy Holidays!

CAPE Group will visit Newburyport for our December excursion. We'll stroll the streets of downtown Newburyport, photographing quaint historic buildings dressed up for the holidays. Once we've had enough of the cold, we'll head to Not Your Average Joe's to warm up!


This event is going to be relaxed and informal, a chance to enjoy photography, and spend time with members of the CAPE Group during the holidays. It's also a chance for us to discuss photography, processing techniques, and whatever else strikes our fancy.


Hope everyone will be able to attend!


Additional Info:
*Consider bringing cash for Not Your Average Joe's, it usually makes things easier when having drinks or eating out with a group.
*Please double check your RSVP several days before the event, to ensure an accurate count for reservations at NYAJ's.

----------------------------------------------------

When: December 30, 2007 at 2PM


Where to Meet: In front of Not Your Average Joe's (NOT inside!) - Newburyport, MA


Parking: There is public parking before, and after, Not Your Average Joe's. (it's usually clearly marked) Directions to Not Your Average Joe's.


Not Your Average Joe's
1 Market Street
Firehouse Center
Directions


Event fee: USD1.00 per person (goes towards the Group's meetup.com fees)


Please take a moment to update your RSVP. (You can RSVP 'No' or 'Maybe' as well as 'Yes'.)
item.name: Rescheduled December Excursion Information
